titles.title: A resolution authorizing the printing of the compilation entitled "Majority and Minority Leaders of the Senate" as a Senate document.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 3/22/1988--Introduced. Authorizes the printing as a Senate document of the compilation entitled "Majority and Minority Leaders of the Senate," including additional copies for the Secretary of the Senate.
